scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && uv run uvicorn psma_api.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev: echo 'Run in two terminals:' && echo '  pnpm dev:api' && echo '  pnpm dev:web'
scripts.gen:openapi: cd apps/api && uv run python -m psma_api.export_openapi ../../contracts/openapi/psma.openapi.json
